channel.description: Lessons covering Chapter 4: rectangular hyperbolas, truncus, square root graphs, and circles. Lesson Topic 4A Rectangular hyperbolas 4B The truncus 4C The graph of $y^2 = x$ 4D The graph of $y = \sqrt{x}$ 4E Circles 4F Determining rules
